biotools.summary: Convert a VCF file into a linkage pedigree file (ped) and a marker information file, which together may be loaded into ld visualization tools like Haploview.

bioschemas.name: 1000Genomes VCF2PED
bioschemas.summary: Convert a VCF file into a linkage pedigree file (ped) and a marker information file, which together may be loaded into ld visualization tools like Haploview.
